abstract: Palm receives a response to its complaint about Apple’s restrictions on its iTunes software — though it was not the answer the company was hoping for.
snippet: Palm receives a response to its complaint about Apple’s restrictions on its iTunes software — though it was not the answer the company was hoping for.
lead_paragraph: The skirmish between Apple and Palm over whether owners of Palm devices can sync them up with their iTunes libraries has come to something of a resolution — though maybe not the one Palm had hoped for.

headline.main: Apple Gets Green Light to Block Palm From iTunes
